name: Button Bliss
description:
Desc:

Button Bliss is a fun stress-free game where you play by pressing only one button and shoot the enemies in a "swishhhh" circular motion. The game includes a bunch of really cool shoot styles to try out, currently 3 Difficulty Modes and an Endless Mode. Try them all!!!

Recent updates:

Fixed some issues with the battle mode and picking options thing.

Incoming updates:

More enemies, modes and upgrades. Android availability(possibly).

Creator's Experience:

I had a lot of different ideas to the "Fun button" thing and in the first 2 days, I kept changing my whole concept. That was stressful but the important thing is that I did it, I finished a game and I submitted it for the first time.

Note:

 If you've got any suggestions, questions or errors you encountered in the game, comment them below and please be polite or I will cry(jk).
